titleStmt.title: Sermons vpon the first chapter of the first epistle generall of Peter Wherein method, sense, doctrine and vse is with great varietie of matter profitably handled. By Nicholas Byfeild preacher of Gods word at Isleworth in Middlesex. The rest of the epistle may be published in due time, if God will.
titleStmt.author: Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold at the signe of the Pyde Bull at S. Austins gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Pyde Bull at S. Austins gate
